Bash("D:\\Programming\\Q-4\\Hackathon-2\\Phase-2\\backend\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "import sys; sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\); from main import app; print\(''FastAPI app created successfully''\); routes = [\(getattr\(r, ''methods'', set\(\)\), getattr\(r, ''path'', str\(r\)\)\) for r in app.routes]; [print\(f''  {m} {p}''\) for m, p in routes]")

Bash("D:\\Programming\\Q-4\\Hackathon-2\\Phase-2\\backend\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "import sys; sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\); from main import app; print\(''FastAPI app created successfully''\); print\(''Registered routes:''\); [print\(f''  {getattr\(r, ""methods"", set\(\)\)} {getattr\(r, ""path"", ""n/a""\)}''\) for r in app.routes if hasattr\(r, ''path''\)]")
